name: Train Simulator: BR Standard Class 6 'Clan Class' Steam Loco Add-On
summary: Recount the bygone era of Pacifics in Scotland, and provide a glimpse into the potential future where 72010 is brought to life in this exquisite Just Trains Pro-Range Add-on for Train Simulator! Following the nationalisation of Britain's 'Big Four' railway companies into British Railways in 1948, it was decided that many new steam...
